name: Carls Color Computations
description:
Meet Carl, the best color computing robot there is! Play a game of Simon Says and select the correct colors in the correct order before smashing your face into the wall to see if you computed correctly!

If you mess up, feel free to interact with the Color Recalibrator. But be warned, extended exposure to the paint stripper may cause you to dissolve entirely!

-------

Controls:

A / D : Move left/right

Space: Interact with object
